description.msg2: I am passionate about programming and work on various projects on GitHub.
description.msg3: On my personal website, I share my works and ideas, offering a glimpse into my world.
description.msg4: Also, on X (formerly Twitter), I share technical topics and daily life updates.
description.msg5: If you're interested in my activities, please check them out!
description.msg6: And, I would appreciate it if you could follow me on X (formerly Twitter) and GitHub!

description.msg1: Here, you can find various articles (or rather blogs) that I have written!
description.msg2: I write about many topics, so please take a look!
